desc.en: Himari is imprisoned by Rio, and the two are still unable to find common ground. Meanwhile, after infiltrating Eridu to rescue Aris, the Game Development Department and the Engineering Department encounter an AMAS built by Rio.
desc.jp: Himari is imprisoned by Rio, and the two are still unable to find common ground. Meanwhile, after infiltrating Eridu to rescue Aris, the Game Development Department and the Engineering Department encounter an AMAS built by Rio.
desc.thai: Himari is imprisoned by Rio, and the two are still unable to find common ground. Meanwhile, after infiltrating Eridu to rescue Aris, the Game Development Department and the Engineering Department encounter an AMAS built by Rio.
desc.ko: Himari is imprisoned by Rio, and the two are still unable to find common ground. Meanwhile, after infiltrating Eridu to rescue Aris, the Game Development Department and the Engineering Department encounter an AMAS built by Rio.
desc.zh_tw: 被莉央監禁的陽葵。兩人依舊走在平行線上。另一方面，潛入埃裡都拯救愛麗絲的遊戲開發部和工程師部遇見了莉央創造的AMAS。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 被莉央监禁的日鞠。两人依旧走在平行在线。另一方面，潜入埃里都拯救爱丽丝的游戏开发部和工程师部遇见了莉央创造的AMAS。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 被莉央监禁的阳葵。两人依旧走在平行在线。另一方面，潜入埃里都拯救爱丽丝的游戏开发部和工程师部遇见了莉央创造的AMAS。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 被莉央监禁的阳葵。两人依旧走在平行在线。另一方面，潜入埃里都拯救爱丽丝的游戏开发部和工程师部遇见了莉央创造的AMAS。

desc.en: The C&C members blast their way through the AMAS as planned, but their relentless determination is stopped by none other than the C&C's fifth member, Toki.
desc.jp: The C&C members blast their way through the AMAS as planned, but their relentless determination is stopped by none other than the C&C's fifth member, Toki.
desc.thai: The C&C members blast their way through the AMAS as planned, but their relentless determination is stopped by none other than the C&C's fifth member, Toki.
desc.ko: The C&C members blast their way through the AMAS as planned, but their relentless determination is stopped by none other than the C&C's fifth member, Toki.
desc.zh_tw: C&C的成員們依照作戰華麗地擊倒了AMAS。C&C的第五個成員季阻止了勢如破竹的他們。
desc.zh_cn_jp: C&C的成员们依照作战华丽地击倒了AMAS。C&C的第五个成员时阻止了势如破竹的他们。
desc.zh_cn_tw: C&C的成员们依照作战华丽地击倒了AMAS。C&C的第五个成员季阻止了势如破竹的他们。
desc.zh_cn_cn: C&C的成员们依照作战华丽地击倒了AMAS。C&C的第五个成员季阻止了势如破竹的他们。

desc.en: Himari was sick of the fact that Rio kidnapped Aris to destroy her halo. Rio still hoped that Himari could understand her, and said it does no difference for her however they resist. Meantime, the detection system of the city had discovered Sensei and the others.
desc.jp: Himari was sick of the fact that Rio kidnapped Aris to destroy her halo. Rio still hoped that Himari could understand her, and said it does no difference for her however they resist. Meantime, the detection system of the city had discovered Sensei and the others.
desc.thai: Himari was sick of the fact that Rio kidnapped Aris to destroy her halo. Rio still hoped that Himari could understand her, and said it does no difference for her however they resist. Meantime, the detection system of the city had discovered Sensei and the others.
desc.ko: Himari was sick of the fact that Rio kidnapped Aris to destroy her halo. Rio still hoped that Himari could understand her, and said it does no difference for her however they resist. Meantime, the detection system of the city had discovered Sensei and the others.
desc.zh_tw: 陽葵對莉央將愛麗絲綁架回來並破壞光環一事感到噁心。莉央則仍希望陽葵能理解她，並表示陽葵和老師等人的反抗毫無意義。通訊間隙，都市的檢測系統已經發現了老師一行人。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 日鞠对莉央将爱丽丝绑架回来并破坏光环一事感到恶心。莉央则仍希望日鞠能理解她，并表示日鞠和老师等人的反抗毫无意义。通讯间隙，都市的检测系统已经发现了老师一行人。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 阳葵对莉央将爱丽丝绑架回来并破坏光环一事感到恶心。莉央则仍希望阳葵能理解她，并表示阳葵和老师等人的反抗毫无意义。通讯间隙，都市的检测系统已经发现了老师一行人。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 阳葵对莉央将爱丽丝绑架回来并破坏光环一事感到恶心。莉央则仍希望阳葵能理解她，并表示阳葵和老师等人的反抗毫无意义。通讯间隙，都市的检测系统已经发现了老师一行人。

school.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール

hobby.jp: 今日の運勢の確認、オカルト全般
hobby.zh_tw: 確認今天的運勢、所有的神秘事物
hobby.zh_cn_tw: 确认今天的运势、所有的神秘事物

desc.en: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.jp: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.thai: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.ko: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.zh_tw: 莉音是千年科學學院研討會的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件發生後引咎辭職。她是Eridu，一個被建造用來抵禦基沃託斯威脅的城市的創造者。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 莉音是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 莉音是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。

school.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.en: The Engineering Department, Game Development Development and Sensei arrived at the city's underground freight passage safely, and was surprised to witness the ability that Veritas possessed. Right at this moment a group of AMAS blocked their way and they started engaging.
desc.jp: The Engineering Department, Game Development Development and Sensei arrived at the city's underground freight passage safely, and was surprised to witness the ability that Veritas possessed. Right at this moment a group of AMAS blocked their way and they started engaging.
desc.thai: The Engineering Department, Game Development Development and Sensei arrived at the city's underground freight passage safely, and was surprised to witness the ability that Veritas possessed. Right at this moment a group of AMAS blocked their way and they started engaging.
desc.ko: The Engineering Department, Game Development Development and Sensei arrived at the city's underground freight passage safely, and was surprised to witness the ability that Veritas possessed. Right at this moment a group of AMAS blocked their way and they started engaging.
desc.zh_tw: 工程部、遊戲開發部和老師安全抵達都市的地下貨運通道，對貝里塔斯的駭客技術大為震撼。這時一群AMAS機器人擋住了他們的去路，眾人立刻開始迎戰。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 工程部、游戏开发部和老师安全抵达都市的地下货运通道，对贝里塔斯的黑客技术大为震撼。这时一群AMAS机器人挡住了他们的去路，众人立刻开始迎战。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 工程部、游戏开发部和老师安全抵达都市的地下货运通道，对贝里塔斯的黑客技术大为震撼。这时一群AMAS机器人挡住了他们的去路，众人立刻开始迎战。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 工程部、游戏开发部和老师安全抵达都市的地下货运通道，对贝里塔斯的黑客技术大为震撼。这时一群AMAS机器人挡住了他们的去路，众人立刻开始迎战。

desc.en: As the Game Development Department confronting enemies, C&C on the ground were making loud noises as well. It eventually attracted Toki's attention.

desc.zh_tw: 就在遊戲開發部積極應敵時，在地面上的C&C也正搞出些大動靜。動靜最後引來了季的現身。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 就在游戏开发部积极应敌时，在地面上的C&C也正搞出些大动静。动静最后引来了时的现身。
